about_the_game:
Arcade air combat - Fly your fighter jet in a 1 v 1 dogfights in this demo of Jet Attack. All 50+ jets are available in the demo for you to try

50+ Jets - All 50+ jets from the full game are available in the demo for you to try.

Demo Features Include:

  • Fast-paced arcade air combat with simple controls and a focus on fun and action

  • 50+ Jets: Including F-22, Su-57, A-10, F-14, F-15, F-16, F-35, F/A-18, J-20, MiG-29, Su-25, Su-27, KF-21, F-104 and more

content_descriptors.notes: Air combat with explosions and implied death, however pilots can eject and cannot be harmed once ejected

detailed_description:
Arcade air combat - Fly your fighter jet in a 1 v 1 dogfights in this demo of Jet Attack. All 50+ jets are available in the demo for you to try

50+ Jets - All 50+ jets from the full game are available in the demo for you to try.

Demo Features Include:

  • Fast-paced arcade air combat with simple controls and a focus on fun and action

  • 50+ Jets: Including F-22, Su-57, A-10, F-14, F-15, F-16, F-35, F/A-18, J-20, MiG-29, Su-25, Su-27, KF-21, F-104 and more

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5GHz or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any built-in or external audio device
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.0GHz or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU with 2GB VRAM or Apple M1
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any built-in or external audio device

name: Jet Attack Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/11/12-capable GPU (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, AMD Radeon R7 260X, or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Fly your fighter jet in a 1 v 1 dogfights in this demo of Jet Attack. All 50+ jets are available in the demo for you to try
